name: Cat in Mint
description:
Description:

The girl Melissa has her own cute house in which she lives with her playful cats. One spring, catnip began to grow in the yard near Melissa's house and the cats began to inevitably run away from the house. Help Melissa delay the inevitable catnip games from the cats, or they'll get naughty!

Go into the yard and look for the cats under a lot of objects scattered there! Under what object were these cats hiding?! But! You can only find one cat at a time! Please take it to the room, and only then go after the next one, you can’t chase two hares at the same time!

Control:

Pull on the scattered object in the yard, if you find a cat under them, then you will have a cat. Take him to his room to rest after the mint fun, but be careful, because the cat may escape again.
